text: Brunella Bovo (4 March 1932 â€“ 21 February 2017) was an Italian movie and television actress. She was born in Padua, Italy. She was known for her roles as Edvige in Miracle in Milan (1951) and as Wanda in The White Sheik (1952). She starred in many B-Movies and soap operas sometimes under the name Barbara Hudson. Bovo died on 21 February 2017 in Rome from pneumonia, aged 84. ==Movies== * Miracle in Milan (1951) * The White Sheik (1952) * Revenge of a Crazy Girl (1952) * Finishing School (1953) * Dieci canzoni d'amore da salvare (1953) * The Loves of Salammbo (1960) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors
title: Brunella Bovo
